generated.css: body{margin:0;background:#fff;color:#666;font-family:Segoe UI,Consolas,monospace,Microsoft YaHei;font-weight:lighter}a{text-decoration:none;color:inherit;transition:color .3s}a:hover{color:#cd3f45}.Blog{margin:0 auto;padding:0 20px;max-width:600px}.Blog__header{margin-top:50px;text-align:center}.Blog__title{font-size:20px}.Blog__links{padding:0;text-align:center;overflow:hidden}.Blog__link{list-style:none;display:inline-block}.Blog__link:not(:first-child){margin-left:8px;padding-left:8px;border-left:1px solid #eee}.Blog__body{margin-top:50px}.Blog__footer{margin-bottom:100px}.Articles__items{padding:0}.Articles__item{position:relative;padding-left:140px;line-height:80px;list-style:none;border-top:1px dashed #eee;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}.Articles__item-date{position:absolute;left:0;font-size:14px;color:hsla(0,0%,40%,.6)}.Articles__item-title{margin:0;font-size:16px;font-weight:400;word-break:keep-all;white-space:nowrap}.Article__header{padding:30px 0;margin-bottom:30px;border-bottom:1px dashed #eee}.Article__title{margin:0;font-size:32px;font-weight:lighter}.Article__details{margin-top:20px;color:hsla(0,0%,40%,.6);font-size:14px;overflow:hidden}.Article__date{float:left}.Article__tags{float:left;margin-left:20px}.Article__tag:not(:first-child){margin-left:8px;padding-left:8px;border-left:1px solid #eee}.Article__comments{float:right}.Article__footer{padding:30px 0;margin-top:30px;border-top:1px dashed #eee}.Article__reply{padding:10px;text-align:center;border-radius:4px;border:1px solid hsla(0,0%,40%,.6)}.markdown-body{color:#666}.markdown-body code,.markdown-body pre{font-family:Consolas,monospace,Microsoft YaHei}@keyframes rotating{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}45%{border-radius:15px;transform:rotate(-180deg)}55%{border-radius:15px;transform:rotate(-180deg)}0%{border-radius:2px;transform:rotate(-1turn)}}.Loader{margin:100px 0;width:100%;text-align:center}.Loader:before{display:inline-block;width:30px;height:30px;box-sizing:border-box;content:"";border:2px solid hsla(0,0%,40%,.6);animation:rotating 1.5s ease-in-out infinite}.Comment{position:relative;padding-left:58px}.Comment:not(:first-child){margin-top:30px}.Comment__header{font-size:14px}.Comment__avatar{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:32px;height:32px;border-radius:4px;overflow:hidden}.Comment__avatar img{width:100%}.Comment__user span{margin-left:8px;padding:1px 4px;font-size:12px;color:#fff;background:#cd3f45;border-radius:4px}.Comment__date{font-size:12px;color:hsla(0,0%,40%,.6)}.Pagination{padding:0;text-align:center}.Pagination__item{list-style:none;display:inline-block;width:32px;height:32px;line-height:32px;border-radius:4px}.Pagination__item:not(:first-child){margin-left:8px}.Pagination__item a{display:block;width:100%;height:100%}.Pagination__item--active{border:1px solid hsla(0,0%,40%,.6)}@media (max-width:767px){.Articles__item{padding-left:120px;line-height:60px}.Articles__item-title{font-size:14px}.Articles__item-date{font-size:12px}.Article__title{font-size:20px}.Article__details{font-size:12px}}
